title: DONT let me pick and bann
body: I cant ban and pick champion and  riot take me leave buster 5 and 15 min

replies.body: That sucks to hear, it sounds like your might have an unstable connection to champion select causing you to de-sync.  You should stick to testing in customs for now, and try the steps in your [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure you're not getting cut off.  Let me know if you have any questions!
